label: ABC2_hR4_160_a_a_2a-003
title: CrCuS$_{2}$ Structure
comments:
Space group $R3m$ \#160 does not specify the origin of the $z$-axis.  Here we choose $z_{I} = 0$ for the position of the chromium atom. 
 \href{current_web_home_dir/ABC2_hR4_160_a_a_2a-002}{$\alpha$-CrOOH} and \href{current_web_home_dir/ABC2_hR4_160_a_a_2a-003}{CrCuS$_{2}$} have the AFLOW prototype label, ABC2\_hR4\_160\_a\_a\_2a. They are generated by the same symmetry operations with different sets of parameters ({\tt --params}) specified in their corresponding CIF files. 
 Hexagonal settings of this structure can be obtained with the option {\tt --hex}.
